attributes.action: STOP the plans to exhume 350,000 bodies in a cemetery for  a new muslim burial site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
London's Tower Hamlets wants to dig up bodies in a cemetery to make way for a new muslim burial site.

The cemetery in question has graves dated 1841, and has a wildlife centre.  This will all be ruined if it it turned into a muslim only cemetry.  It is disgraceful to think that all the people buried in the cemetery could be dug up, and disposed of, just like that.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
